item.title: js qrcode
item.description: qrcode <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.staticfile.org/jquery.qrcode/1.0/jquery.qrcode.min.js"></script> <div id="qrcode" style="width: 200px; height: 200px;"></div> <script> $(document).ready(function () { var qrData = "https://www.qq.com?p=100"; $("#qrcode").qrcode({ width: 200, height: 200, text: qrData }); }); </script> Node Server const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { if (req.url === '/') { req.url = '/index.html'; } const filePath = path.join(__dirname, 'public', req.url); fs.readFile(filePath, (err, content) => { if (err) { // 读取自定义的404页面 fs.
